CustomField.formula: IF(AND(Days_Until_Due__c > 0, Days_Until_Due__c <= 5), "Due within 5 Days", IF(AND(Days_Until_Due__c > 5, Days_Until_Due__c <= 15), "Due within 15 Days", IF(AND(Days_Until_Due__c > 15, Days_Until_Due__c <= 30), "Due within 30 Days", IF(Days_Until_Due__c > 30, "30+ Days", IF(Days_Overdue__c >0, "Past Due", null )))))
CustomField.label: Due Status
